exercise-tasks.description: Assign a row number to each country ordered by population descending
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Population,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS RowNum
FROM Countries
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS RowNum FROM Countries

exercise-tasks.description: Assign a rank to each country by population descending
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Population,
  RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS Rank
FROM Countries
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS Rank FROM Countries

exercise-tasks.description: Assign a dense rank to each country by population descending
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Population,
  DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS DenseRank
FROM Countries
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS DenseRank FROM Countries

exercise-tasks.description: Divide all countries into 3 tiers using NTILE based on population
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Name,
  Population,
  NTILE(3) OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS PopulationTier
FROM Countries
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Name, Population, NTILE(3) OVER (ORDER BY Population DESC) AS PopulationTier FROM Countries
